title: EdTech Collaboration Design Studio for Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics instruction experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Focuses on instructional technology integration and practical application in VR-based virtual classroom settings.

learning_goals: Through collaborative problem-solving processes, learners can select and apply at least three effective educational technology tools for mathematics instruction.
Learners can develop mathematics lesson scenarios by applying evidence-based instructional design principles in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can evaluate and improve the feasibility of technology-integrated lessons by utilizing a peer feedback system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
